title: 367: Zach Bitter- Ketogenic 100 Mile Record Holder
description: Zach Bitter is an Ultrarunner and Coach, 100 Mile American Record Holder and 12 Hour World Record Holder. Not only does he run long distances but he does it with minimal carbs. In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin interview Zach who provides a lot of insight on being a fat adapted athlete. Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic and the Butt Builder Blueprint (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Get your Kimera Koffee, Mind Pump's first official sponsor, at www.kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off! Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
